entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Calgary (Olympic Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:31 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.2°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
